snippet.title: Hillbilly Hellfire Alpha Trailer - Skeeter vs. the Demonic Hordes!
snippet.description:
The wait is over! Dive into the world of Hillbilly Hellfire with our first Alpha Trailer! 🔥 Watch Skeeter, a hillbilly meth cook with a divine mission, battle waves of skeleton warriors, hellhounds, and monstrous demons in this chaotic tower defense shooter.

This trailer gives you an exclusive sneak peek at the gritty action, explosive gameplay, and energetic setting that define Hillbilly Hellfire.

📅 Don't miss the live trailer launch during our Twitch stream on December 15, 2024!
🎮 Demo goes live for Steam Next Fest starting February 24, 2025.

👉 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2920890/HillbillyHellfire/

👉 Press kits available on Discord:
https://discord.gg/ZY9fMRHs 

👉 Follow us on Twitch for live updates: https://www.twitch.tv/slagathorstudios

#HillbillyHellfire #GameTrailer #IndieGames #TowerDefense #DemonShooter #UnrealEngine
